A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Good: visuals\, landscapes and effects are incredible. Bad: everything else. Too many characters to develop anyone character at all. The seemingly critical pair of characters to the story from TFA\, at least in terms of plot relevancy\, Snoke and Luke\, both turn out to be worthless afterthoughts\,. Rey and Kylo Ren's interactions play like something from a twilight movie. Nothing is explained: First Order can track through light speed\, just because. They then have to follow the resistance at slow speed and wait for their gas to run out\, just because. Snoke is Darth Sidious level powerful\, just because. Who trained him? Where does he come from?  Doesn't matter\, because we've got to get back to Finn releasing creatures from the casino planet with the help of a guy who was on a jail cell that he could have gotten out of at anytime\, just because. Why is this getting great reviews? Just because.
